document_data.name: Dragoncall
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dragoncall''''' was a spell that was used by [[dragon]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell was used by dragons to both communicate and compel a nearby sentient creature to hurry to the casting dragon's location. The creature rushed to the location as fast and as safely as possible—the spell could not force a creature to harm itself unnecessarily. ''Dragoncall'' could only be cast by dragons.
document_data.Components: This spell required only a [[verbal component]].
